title: Ben Affleck dotes on his children during outing with his mother Christine Boldt
text:
Ben Affleck has proven to be a total family man, happily co-parenting with ex-wife Jennifer Garner.

Now, the Gone Girl actor is getting in some quality time with his mother Christine Boldt.

They stepped out Wednesday to spend time with the kids while Garner grabbed lunch with a gal pal nearby.

Pickup duty: Ben Affleck stepped out Wednesday to spend time with his children while ex Jennifer Garner grabbed lunch with a gal pal nearby

Affleck went casual chic in a slate cotton blazer as he arrived at the Brentwood area with his mom.

He wore the coat over a white Harley Davidson t-shirt with a pair of loose-fitting jeans.

The Good Will Hunting star completed the look with a pair of light grey leather sneakers and gold-framed aviators.

He walked with daughter Seraphina while Grandma Christine followed close behind with son Samuel.

Meanwhile, Garner was spotted stepping out with a girlfriend for lunch in the nearby Beverly Hills.

She kept it simple but chic in a white t-shirt, which she wore tucked into a pair of slim black pants.

The look was completed with a pair of round tortoiseshell sunglasses and some knee-high black leather boots.

She carried a burnt orange leather purse with a cream knit sweater draped over her arm.

Garner and Affleck, both 47, were married from 2005 to 2018, sharing daughters Violet, 13, Seraphina, 10, and son Samuel, seven.
